word_mean: 浸没，浸入：处于或使处于液体表面之下

sentence.Network_en: Vetiveria zizanioides can survive after 5 months of complete submersion.
sentence.Network_cn: 实验结果表明,香根草完全淹水5个月仍能存活.

sentence.Network_en: Background Drowning is defined as death due to submersion in liquid.
sentence.Network_cn: 溺死是指淹没于液体之中发生的死亡.

sentence.Network_en: An unextinguished fire also contributed to the ship's submersion.
sentence.Network_cn: 无法扑灭的大火也促使这艘轮船沉没水中.

stems_affixes.word_buile: sub在下面+mers沉,没+ed……的→adj.生长水中的,浸没的,淹没的
e出+mers沉,没+ion表名词→沉下有出现→浮现
sub在下面+mers沉,没+ion表名词→submerge的名词
